context: State university system, 50,000 students, implementing campus-wide digital learning platform

request.purpose: Digital learning platform and faculty development
request.justification: Post-pandemic learning preferences, 40% enrollment decline without modernization

decision_process.outcome: Identified hybrid learning as preferred model with 70% student support
Selected comprehensive platform with 5-year implementation plan

decision_criteria: Competitive positioning in higher education market
lessons_learned: Comprehensive change management essential for faculty adoption, phased implementation reduces resistance and improves success rates
